tosdr.tldr: Skype use cookies on your computer. This gives Skype various forms of information about you, your preferences and behaviour. You can choose to reject all cookies in your browser but this may prevent the service from working optimally. To track you on other Microsoft owned sites (Microsoft owns Skype) and across the web, Skype may also use web beacons and other technologies that act in a similar way to cookies and gather and contain information about your web browsing behaviour.
